msg_hybrid_search_desc: Execute full-text search and vector search simultaneously, use RRF algorithm for ranking, select results that better match user questions from both query results
msg_vector_search_desc: Convert user question into vector and match similarity with knowledge base segments, return results with high similarity
msg_full_text_search_desc: Match words in documents through word segmentation, return text segments containing these words
msg_top_k_tooltip: Maximum number of segments recalled from knowledge base, minimum 1, maximum 10. More segments recalled means more tokens consumed.
msg_similarity_tooltip: Only recall text segments with similarity greater than threshold during recall. Range: 0~1, higher threshold means more accurate answers, recommended not to exceed 0.9
msg_metadata_tooltip: Metadata filtering uses metadata attributes (e.g., group, knowledge creation time) to refine and control the retrieval process of relevant information in the system. Only knowledge meeting requirements will be recalled.
msg_recall_neighbor_tooltip: When relevant segments are retrieved from the knowledge base, related context will be concatenated based on configuration and returned to the LLM as final content. After enabling, avoid setting segment overlap length during segmentation to prevent affecting final results. No processing will be done for parent-child segment type knowledge bases or when segment word count exceeds 3000.
